channel.title: Hello lol
channel.description: Alright everybody :o I haven't coded scar in about.. 1, 2 years now? Kinda wanna get back into it, problem-> I don't remember anything about it, alot has happened these last few years, making it hard to remember somethings. Anybody wanna help me refresh my skills? :s Its been awhile, but I can learn again :\

item.title: Hello lol
item.dc:creator: @wyn10 wyn10
item.description:
@wyn10 wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:8, topic:69229”]I think that was completly uncalled for?
Anybody wanna show me how to make a walking script?
I’m sure I’m gonna need to remember that.[/quote]

srry i was watching south park as i was posting that and sumtimes with brackets it doesnt need the semi-colon…also i can help you making a walking script if you want

Read full topic

item.title: Hello lol
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:9, topic:69229”]writeln() needs a ; at the end of it, surely.

Unless Scar is even more leniant than I thought.[/quote]

SCAR isn’t as strict about some things, you can do procedures(Writeln, ect) without the semi-colon, but not setting variables ect. “a := a + 1” Would give you an error that says it requires a semicolon.

Read full topic

item.title: Hello lol
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:9, topic:69229”]writeln() needs a ; at the end of it, surely.

Unless Scar is even more leniant than I thought.[/quote]
Surprisingly SCAR allows it, but it’s bad code practice not to have it…

I suggest using RadialRoadWalk for walking.

Read full topic

item.title: Hello lol
item.dc:creator: @wyn10 wyn10
item.description:
@wyn10 wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:6, topic:69229”][quote author=wyn10 link=topic=101710.msg1032160#msg1032160 date=1174437522]
here is your first script yourll make

[code]
program speakhi;

procedure sayhi;
begin
writeln(‘im a big noob lmfao :P’)
end;

begin
sayhi;
end. [/code]

lmfao…srry
[/quote]

You fail, that script won’t compile.[/quote]

yeah it will…i just tryed it. you copy and pasted wrong…you basterd! lmfao

item.title: Hello lol

item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Well…
I haven’t coded in awhile, but I know how to make a script that talks…
Those are the first things you experiment with.
I’m trying to get back into what I use to do and make Ultimate Woodcutters/Miners…
Been awhile, but I think I can do it in a matter of time.

item.title: Hello lol
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“wyn10, post:3, topic:69229”]here is your first script yourll make

[code]
program speakhi;

procedure sayhi;
begin
writeln(‘im a big noob lmfao :P’)
end;

begin
sayhi;
end. [/code]

lmfao…srry :P[/quote]

My first script was an auto-msn responder using bitmaps. Others have made tut runners as their first script, some more complex than others.

Don’t judge a book by it’s cover.

Read full topic
